prompts: Create a fluffy electric-type Pokemon that has a playful demeanor and a bright color palette.
Generate a cute Pokemon that resembles a sheep, showcasing vibrant blue and white colors.
Design a small, round Pokemon that can generate electricity, with a charming appearance and soft features.
Imagine an adorable Pokemon that has a woolly body and a blue face, perfect for a friendly team.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by farm animals, with distinct fluffy features and an energetic personality.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands, known for its electric abilities and endearing looks.
Make a Pokemon that embodies cuteness and electricity, suitable for trainers looking for a loyal companion.
